name: A Wizard in a Cave
description:
You are a wizard exploring an endless cave system filled with bats waiting to attack. How far can you go?

Source

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Left mouse click - shoot earth projectile
  • Right mouse click - shoot fire projectile

Tools & resources used:

  • jfxr - sound effects generator
  • m5x7 font by Daniel Linssen
  • AutoTracker-C - music generator by Ben "GreaseMonkey" Russell
